email_content:
Dear Hope and Healing Foundation Team,

I hope you are well. On behalf of everyone at New Horizons Recovery Center, thank you for the generous support you have provided for our addiction-recovery outreach programs. Your partnership has been instrumental in helping us extend life-changing services to individuals and families in our community.

Over the past year, our outreach initiatives have achieved encouraging results:
• Community engagement in our programs has grown by 40%.
• We have recorded a 15% improvement in client recovery rates after integrating holistic approaches with traditional treatment.
• Signature offerings such as the "Steps to Sobriety" workshop series and the "Family Support Network" continue to attract new participants and foster sustained recovery.

Building on this momentum, we have identified several opportunities where additional funding would make an immediate impact:
1. Expanding the "Steps to Sobriety" workshops to two additional neighborhoods.
2. Launching a mobile outreach unit to reach populations with limited access to transportation.
3. Developing bilingual educational materials to engage underserved communities.

Would the foundation be open to discussing an expanded grant or other forms of support to help realize these goals? I would be happy to send a brief proposal or arrange a call at your convenience to explore how we can continue working together.

Thank you again for your steadfast commitment to recovery and healing. I look forward to the possibility of deepening our collaboration.

Warm regards,

John [Last Name]
Alcohol & Drug Abuse Assistance Coordinator
New Horizons Recovery Center
Phone: (555) 123-4567
Email: john@newhorizons.org
